problem_names:
lemma meta_interp_law:
"(\<And>P. PROP Q P) \<equiv> (\<And>P. PROP Q (P o f))"

lemma all_interp_law:
"(\<forall>P. Q P) = (\<forall>P. Q (P o f))"

lemma exists_interp_law:
"(\<exists>P. Q P) = (\<exists>P. Q (P o f))"
translations:
lemma meta_interp_law:
"(\<And>P. PROP Q P) \<equiv> (\<And>P. PROP Q (P o f))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>P. PROP Q P) \<equiv> (\<And>P. PROP Q (P \<circ> f))

apply (rule equal_intr_rule)
    \<comment> \<open>Subgoal 1\<close>

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>P. (\<And>P. PROP Q P) \<Longrightarrow> PROP Q (P \<circ> f)
 2. \<And>P. (\<And>P. PROP Q (P \<circ> f)) \<Longrightarrow> PROP Q P
apply (drule_tac x = "P o f" in meta_spec)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>P. PROP Q (P \<circ> f) \<Longrightarrow> PROP Q (P \<circ> f)
 2. \<And>P. (\<And>P. PROP Q (P \<circ> f)) \<Longrightarrow> PROP Q P

apply (assumption)
    \<comment> \<open>Subgoal 2\<close>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P. (\<And>P. PROP Q (P \<circ> f)) \<Longrightarrow> PROP Q P
apply (drule_tac x = "P o inv f" in meta_spec)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P. PROP Q (P \<circ> inv f \<circ> f) \<Longrightarrow> PROP Q P
apply (simp add: f_inj)

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done

lemma all_interp_law:
"(\<forall>P. Q P) = (\<forall>P. Q (P o f))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<forall>P. Q P) = (\<forall>P. Q (P \<circ> f))

apply (safe)
    \<comment> \<open>Subgoal 1\<close>

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>P. \<forall>P. Q P \<Longrightarrow> Q (P \<circ> f)
 2. \<And>P. \<forall>P. Q (P \<circ> f) \<Longrightarrow> Q P
apply (drule_tac x = "P o f" in spec)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>P. Q (P \<circ> f) \<Longrightarrow> Q (P \<circ> f)
 2. \<And>P. \<forall>P. Q (P \<circ> f) \<Longrightarrow> Q P

apply (assumption)
    \<comment> \<open>Subgoal 2\<close>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P. \<forall>P. Q (P \<circ> f) \<Longrightarrow> Q P
apply (drule_tac x = "P o inv f" in spec)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P. Q (P \<circ> inv f \<circ> f) \<Longrightarrow> Q P
apply (simp add: f_inj)

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done

lemma exists_interp_law:
"(\<exists>P. Q P) = (\<exists>P. Q (P o f))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<exists>P. Q P) = (\<exists>P. Q (P \<circ> f))

apply (safe)
    \<comment> \<open>Subgoal 1\<close>

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>P. Q P \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P. Q (P \<circ> f)
 2. \<And>P. Q (P \<circ> f) \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P. Q P
apply (rule_tac x = "P o inv f" in exI)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>P. Q P \<Longrightarrow> Q (P \<circ> inv f \<circ> f)
 2. \<And>P. Q (P \<circ> f) \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P. Q P

apply (simp add: f_inj)
    \<comment> \<open>Subgoal 2\<close>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P. Q (P \<circ> f) \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P. Q P
apply (rule_tac x = "P o f" in exI)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P. Q (P \<circ> f) \<Longrightarrow> Q (P \<circ> f)
apply (assumption)

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done
end
end
